grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 盤【バン】disk, disc, record, clock face, tray, shallow bowl, grid, board (e.g. in shogi)
地盤【ジバン】ground, crust (earth), bed (gravel, river, etc.), foundation (building, etc.), base, constituency, power base, support (electoral), footing, foothold
中盤【チュウバン】middle stage, middle phase, middle game, midfield
